member.name: WICImageParameters
member.summary: This defines parameters that you can use to override the default parameters normally used when encoding an image.

member.name: WICImageParameters.PixelFormat
member.summary: The pixel format to which the image is processed before it is written to the encoder.

member.name: WICImageParameters.DpiX
member.summary: The DPI in the x dimension.

member.name: WICImageParameters.DpiY
member.summary: The DPI in the y dimension.

member.name: WICImageParameters.Top
member.summary: The top corner in pixels of the image space to be encoded to the destination.

member.name: WICImageParameters.Left
member.summary: The left corner in pixels of the image space to be encoded to the destination.

member.name: WICImageParameters.PixelWidth
member.summary: The width in pixels of the part of the image to write.

member.name: WICImageParameters.PixelHeight
member.summary: The height in pixels of the part of the image to write.
